title: Purpose Investments to Launch World’s First Spot Solana ETF
description: The ETF will offer staking yield powered by Purpose’s proprietary infrastructure to offer investors enhanced staking rewards TORONTO, April 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) — Purpose Investments Inc. (“Purpose”), the firm behind the world’s first spot Bitcoin and Ether ETFs, is set to launch the world’s first spot Solana ETF — Purpose Solana ETF (ticker: SOLL). The […]

title: Minister's X account hacked to promote 'House of Commons' crypto scam
description: The MP's office says "steps were taken quickly to secure the account and remove misleading posts".
